newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-BARCELONA WIN ON LATE EXTRA TIME GOAL.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BARCELONA WIN ON LATE EXTRA TIME GOAL.

text.p: Barcelona scored a dramatic 3-2 triumph over Real Betis on a late extra time goal to win the Spanish Cup at the Santiago Bernabeau stadium on Saturday night.
Portuguese Luis Figo fired home the vital goal five minutes from the end of extra time after the sides were 2-2 after 90 minutes.
Betis scores first from Alfonzo Munoz after 11 minutes but Figo equalised a minute from halftime.
The Seville side took the lead again after 82 minutes from Nigerian international Finidi George but three minutes later Barcelona's striker Juan Pizzi brought the sides level again.
